name: Animal Story
description:
The little animals from 💝Animal Story💝 are calling out for your help!!

So please open your heart and help these adorable little animals get back to nature! Set up your own animal reserve and let the animals roam free, just like they should.

Put Operation Animal Rescue into action! ◕‿◕

✲ Game Highlights ✲
✎Let the animals enjoy the paradise you create for them!
✎Collect more than 50 different types of rare and exotic animals.
✎Send animals off exploring to find new friends.
✎Enjoy the awesome background music with the animals!
